## Description

I enjoy searching for new topics outside of my 'day job' relating to statistics and programming in R although, I will occasionally use Python to create animated videos with a package called `manim` (if you've seen any 3Blue1Brown video's on YouTube you will have seen this package implemented there.)

::: {.column width="175%" .flex-column}

This site is focused primarily on statistics with an emphasis in medical applications although not exclusively. The aim is to push my statistical knowledge, searching for new methods and to catalogue these as often the things I stumble across become forgotten and buried in my  hard drive. A lot of my previous jobs have been spent looking at static outputs so where possible I like to show interactive and alternative ways to display data (3-d plots [e.g., using rayshader], dynamic figures, tables, etc). The opinions and thoughts expressed here are my own and do not represent anyone else (i.e., employer).
